website_summaries.verdict: A good choice if you're looking for a product that offers a lot of protein per serving without any fat or carbs.
pros: Smooth consistency that isn't too grainy
Tasteless when blended in a smoothie
cons: Tends to settle quickly, so you must keep stirring

customer_reviews.title: Try the small package before investing in the big one.
customer_reviews.text: The 44 pound package was a great deal on the per pound price, but I didn't know if I would like it. I bought this smaller package to try the product before investing in the bigger purchase. I actually don't like it much. On the bright side it mixes like a dream. The flavor is about standard for soy isolate. On the down side, it foams up really badly in the shaker. Then when I add water to the shaker to rinse it out it foams up again. Then it still feels foamy in the stomach after I drink it. Because of the foam issue, I really didn't like it.
customer_reviews.author: Sonny L

customer_reviews.title: Check “Best buy” date
customer_reviews.text: I had just received the product and was in the process of making my first protein shake. As I looked for the directions of how much to use I noticed the “Best by” date was almost three months ago. Not good. If you buy their product I suggest you check the expiration date.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Do not exceed 30g per day, keep out of reach of children.
customer_reviews.text: Bulksupplements is an ideal concept but only if it's for ideal supplements. The label says Distributed by Henderson, NV but the truth is it is sourced in China, no wonder theres a warning not to exceed 30 grams per day and to keep out of reach of children. This is why I always buy organic soy milk and bulksupplements would do well to invest in USDA organic certification if they want to stay ahead of the supplement curve. Personal experience, powder does not blend in a blender and always settles to the bottom like sediment no matter what you mix it with. I hope GMP means no heavy metals, especially from China. At over $9/lb smh.
customer_reviews.author: Truth Hurts

customer_reviews.title: Another low carb miracle
customer_reviews.text: Great for low carb baking. I use a quarter cup of each soy protein then quarter cup of flax, chia, hemp seed mix and a quarter cup hulded hemp seed one egg pinch of salt. and almond milk little sweetner .mix to pancake consistancy in a big widemouth mug . microwave for about 2.5 to 3 min. dump out slice and fry slices in pan makes great toast. Or soak bread slices in egg and fry for french toast. Or add in cocoa powder and coconut shred or nuts or some frozen blueberries for a nice muffin. In 3 Min!
customer_reviews.author: Charlene

customer_reviews.title: Good deal
customer_reviews.text: I needed a new protein powder after Trader Joe's stopped making theirs, but I couldn't find anything unflavored until I checked amazon. This one has a slightly nuttier taste, but it's mild. Shaking makes it foam up, but the powder dissolves fine with stirring instead. I like how precise the labeling is compared to most.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Cooper

customer_reviews.title: But I am glad to know what my body needs now
customer_reviews.text: Recently had my blood done for food allergy/intolerance . No gluten, wheat, dairy, almonds or eggs from now on. Coming from bodybuilding, meal prepping and dieting this really limited my options. But I am glad to know what my body needs now. This soy isolate is amazing. Yes it has a earthy texture but it's not bad. Not really a taste but it mixes well in my shaker. I've used it in baking eith my GF and vegan muffins and breads. Works great. Definitely will be reordering and checking out other BulkSupplements. Thank you guys for providing us with clean pure sups!
customer_reviews.author: R'Lena Petines

customer_reviews.title: Nutty Taste, Good Price.
customer_reviews.text: Headline says it all. This is a great alternative to milk based protein powders, which I avoid because they tend to impact my skin. This isn't like your typical Whey protein. It's not full of artificial sweeteners and it doesn't taste like vanilla or chocolate. However, when mixed with almond milk and nothing else, you get a nutty, soybean flavor that's very passable, and perhaps even appetizing. In the protein powder world, that's pure gold.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: A good deal for a hard to find item
customer_reviews.text: I’m not crazy about the packaging. When it is put in a box with other products it tends to get punctures in the package easily. It is also one of those ‘tear open, reseal’ packages, and the tear almost always messes up the top of the bag so it doesn’t reseal properly. I always pour mine in a plastic jar container from a different brand. Other than the packaging, it is an excellent bargain! I use this every day for smoothies to help control my diabetes.
customer_reviews.author: MummieT

customer_reviews.title: Amino Acid Profile
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for some protein for cooking and baking. I was actually going to get Bulk Supplements Whey Isolate when I came across this. I'm impressed by the amino acid profile which was what sold me. By itself, I don't really like the taste but it blends in with baked goods and works pretty good for protein pancakes. I'll be back for more.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: Good value, good quality, WITHOUT WASTEFUL LARGE PLASTIC CANISTER
customer_reviews.text: Satisfied. Protein powder in general isn't very exciting, but this one from Bulk Supplements gets 5 stars for timely delivery, good price, good product. I chose this brand because of the packaging. Other protein powders come in large plastic canisters which (recycled or not) are not good for the environment. The powder itself has a very mild taste, which I don't find bad. It's a tiny bit gritty, but I've never come across a protein powder that wasn't. I recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Alli C

customer_reviews.title: Cheap, simple and clean protein powder
customer_reviews.text: My stomach did not like Whey Protein very much, so I wanted to try a different type and saw this 90% soy isolate. Use as a daily filler to help hit my macro numbers. Flavor is blah (as its meant to be). I get flavor by adding this to water and adding a scoop of BCAA and orange flavored fiber as my post-workout shake. Goes down real easy.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Repulsive taste
customer_reviews.text: I use other Bulk Supenents protein powders, and like them all. But this one is out-right repulsive. The taste is so bad that I struggled 3 times to not puke it up before giving up and dumping it all. I also tried adding it to juices with no luck.
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product well suited for protein shakes.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Dissolves well, and has a neutral flavor, so it blends in well into other foods and beverages. It lacks the "powdery" texture/taste associated with the Trader Joes soy protein I had been using. I use it primarily in a protein shake together with whey and cannabis protein following my interval training workouts, to boost HGH production. Which seems to be helping.
customer_reviews.author: WSDarter

customer_reviews.title: Great Soy powder and the package keeps it nice and dry
customer_reviews.text: My previous supplier of Soy Protein Isolate is having issues with their source so I was forced to shop around for another source. I came across Bulksupplements. They are about $1.50 more per pound than I was paying but the product is very good. It comes sealed in a Ziploc Mylar bag. I've been using it for two weeks and the consistency and potency are the same as my previous source. My only wish is that they sold it in 5lb bags for a better deal.
customer_reviews.author: Snapperheadjoe

customer_reviews.title: Bad all around...
customer_reviews.text: Can’t find a worse protein out there. The packaging is designed in way that when you open it for the first time, you get powder everywhere and it’s very messy. Then I tried closing the package, but the seal didn’t work so I had to use clips. The product doesn’t mix well at all (I used 1 scoop with 12oz of oat milk in a blender bottle). And of course, the taste is so bad I had to add 3 stevia packets to wash it down.
customer_reviews.author: Angelo J

customer_reviews.title: I added the powder to a pancake mix with fairly good results. Taste was neutral although the pancake was ...
customer_reviews.text: I will update this review once I have tried the product in a smoothie but have only baked with it at this time. I added the powder to a pancake mix with fairly good results. Taste was neutral although the pancake was a bit heavy/dense; however I think more leavening may be the key. In any case, this is a quality product and one I will purchase again primarily because of its nutritional profile, specifically the sodium level. Yes, people require sodium but there is often too much "salt" in most food products today and I like to use less when I have the option.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer 999

customer_reviews.title: Thanks!
customer_reviews.text: I was searching for a non-animal protein source to add to my supplement stack and learned about pea protein. Most of the supplements were pretty pricey or GMO but after learning the it was sold by Bulksupplements, which I have purchased several supplements from before, and non-GMO, I decided to buy this. If you are having trouble getting the bag to seal, as it seems many do, I found that while the bag is open flicking the out side edge where the ziplock parts is helps to clear the supplement from the seal.
customer_reviews.author: Kaleb

customer_reviews.title: Quality product at a good price
customer_reviews.text: This soy protein powder is good quality based on a number of years I have been using such products.
customer_reviews.author: Don

customer_reviews.title: Soy Protain Isolate Powder
customer_reviews.text: I can't write good or bad now but I, just started use for loss of muscle. because I have an severe allergy and Fibromyalgia. so, I like the plain taste. and hope to work long run. In future I can wright review again.
customer_reviews.author: RentonWA

customer_reviews.title: Like the other brand's product
customer_reviews.text: Like the other brand's product, it is grainy when mixed with soy milk, and leaves some residue inside my plastic container. So I think that's true for all soy powders. I'll probably try egg protein next. I use a blender on high to mix 4 cups of soy milk, 100 grams of soy powder, 1 packet saccharine, 2 teaspoons vanilla, and 1 banana, and pour it into a 2 quart plastic bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Aronson

customer_reviews.title: No taste. Tad chalky. Needs better packaging.
customer_reviews.text: As far as soy products go, this is flavorless, although it’s a bit chalky. It is filling and keeps me full longer than some products. I haven’t noted a bad aftertaste. The only thing that could be better is the packaging, as some of the powder was above the locking seal line after shipping. Despite my efforts to shake it down, some of the product got on the counter when I opened it.
customer_reviews.author: farmer's daughter

customer_reviews.title: Best Plant Based Protein I've Tried
customer_reviews.text: I have spent ages searching for a plant based protein that wasn't sugar filled, disgusting, or extremely expensive. I went through the biggies on the market and they either broke the budget or left much to be desired. This soy protein does not ruin the taste of things, has pretty good macros (27g protein, <1g fat, 112 cals), and you get a good amount of it for the price. I've been using it in my smoothies and am extremely pleased. I'm going to try their pea protein as well out of curiosity but this is now a staple in my diet.
customer_reviews.author: Sam Schrama

customer_reviews.title: Good plain protein at a good price
customer_reviews.text: Good plain protein at a good price. The bag is nice quality but somewhat challenging to seal. Doesn't taste like much, doesn't take up too much shelf space, doesn't break the bank. Soy protein is a lot slower-digesting than whey, and IMO that's a good thing. Will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Marzipan Frye

customer_reviews.title: Great protein/ poor packaging
customer_reviews.text: Can only say positive things about this protein. Great price when compared to other brands. The taste is not good but if you're expecting an UNFLAVORED soy protein to taste good you're delusional. This product is perfect if you're looking for a pure protein. I mix it with soy milk and fruits and it tastes great. Consistency can be a little gelatinous so make sure it is well blended. I am not giving it a 5 star because of its package. I understand that it lowers its price but it could have at least a more effective sealing. I will definitely buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: jorge luiz gesser carneiro

customer_reviews.title: Gives me gas
customer_reviews.text: I enjoy this, but afterward it seems to give me gas more often than not. I eat a lot of tofu and tempeh with no problem, so it’s not a soy allergy. I won’t buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Robin H.

customer_reviews.title: You shouldn't buy this if you're looking for a tasty supplement!
customer_reviews.text: It definitely provides what you're looking for if you're only looking for the supplement itself. If you want something that tastes good and want a package that is easy to close, then STAY AWAY from this one. The taste and consistancy is very chalky and the bag is incredibly hard to close...it took me like four tries before it would zip back together. I even put Ovaltine in the drink and that didn't really help that much. You're buying this because it's cheap and that's about it.
customer_reviews.author: MIKE WOZNIAK

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: Been trying to find a supplement that has a complete amino acid profile and this one has nearly all of them and it is super high in protein to boot. I use it in shakes and the taste is good alone but I also put in powdered peanut butter and yummm, it's delicious and creamy and super nutritious and energizing!
customer_reviews.author: D. Marshall

customer_reviews.title: Not good
customer_reviews.text: Extremely foamy. Like, any space that is left in the shaker bottle is filled with foam that doesn't disappear for hours after I finish drinking it. Within a minute, most of the suspended powder sinks to the bottom in a thick goo. I might return what I have, and definitely won't order again.
customer_reviews.author: The Kolbe Family

customer_reviews.title: Made me feel sick
customer_reviews.text: Made my stomach quite upset. And I've had soy-protein smoothies daily for years.
customer_reviews.author: Steve A

customer_reviews.title: Complete Proteins needed for dietary choices
customer_reviews.text: Wife and Daughter decided to begin a Vegetarian lifestyle. I needed to find ways to incorporate Protein and Complete Protein supplements into their current eating decisions. We are now experimenting with the powders to supplement their dietary needs... Sorry for grammar but its hard to type with one hand and eat a burger with the other.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sugar free, high protein, great price.
customer_reviews.text: I like this product because it has a high protein content and no sugars. I mix it 50-50 with Pea protein powder also available from bulk supplements. It’s pretty bland but not bad tasting if you add a packet of saccharine. I lost 25 pounds in the last 30 days. I post some photos but I wanna lose another 15 before I do that. Of course moderate exercise and vitamin supplements are to go with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great, I'll definitely order more.
customer_reviews.text: Good stuff. I prefer my food natural as possible, but this was an awesome way to make sure I got protein when I needed it. Whey can cause my tummy issues, especially with lactose. I tolerated this very well and definitely noticed the protein going to work. The taste is pretty inoffensive, which is good, without any sweeteners -- no need to cover it with tons of sugar, etc. In fact, I found my favorite way was to sprinkle on some crispy rice cereal with your choice of favorite milk. If you really need to sweeten it a little, vanilla almond milk was yummy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... protein but it mixes extremely well and doesn’t taste bad at all so it’s great for adding to smoothies ...
customer_reviews.text: Was a little skeptical about this unflavored soy protein but it mixes extremely well and doesn’t taste bad at all so it’s great for adding to smoothies or baking with to add extra protein to anything. And it doesn’t cost a lot at so the value is huge. Plus it has zero carbs and under a g of fat per serving. I will be buying again, and also trying some other stuff from Bulk Supplements.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Found my vegan protein source.
customer_reviews.text: This is just what I was looking for...a vegan protein source without a lot of sweetener or added flavor. Still, I am pleasantly surprised. I don't like soy. This product is virtually tasteless in a fruit smoothy. It is not gritty, powdery, or foamy. I mix it with enough water to form a soft paste and scrape it into the blender with some fresh or frozen fruit and enough water to form a "shake like" consistency. It does not settle out in the glass. I will buy this product again.
customer_reviews.author: SSaunders

customer_reviews.title: Purely perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Pure and perfect! This product is exactly what I want..no grills, no flavors; no additives I don't want.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Good Price and Taste
customer_reviews.text: I happened upon the Soy Protein Isolate by chance when my uncle gave some of his to me. It's a good amount for a really good price, generally tasteless, which after trying tons of different flavored proteins, is a good reprieve and gives you room to try it in more foods and experiment. Definitely will be buying more!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah M

customer_reviews.title: High quality product.
customer_reviews.text: Blends very easily and I love it because you can add whatever flavor you want and change it up each time you use the protein!
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Morris

customer_reviews.title: Very good protein source when on the go
customer_reviews.text: Very good protein source when on the go! I mix it with fruits and berries and make a smoothie with one scoop of this and it's perfect. Totally unflavored so I only taste the fruits I put -- this is my second time buying!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Helps with the hot flashes and taste good too!!
customer_reviews.text: I have been adding it to my morning workout drink and I have felt more energized and can push thru my exercises easier. 5/27/2019- I have less incidents of my hot flashes when using this product.
customer_reviews.author: Rosemary Davis

customer_reviews.title: Over priced
customer_reviews.text: I don’t really like it being bulk , checking other prices I believe is over price, it tastes ok.
customer_reviews.author: Beautiful flower

customer_reviews.title: Great Powder
customer_reviews.text: Great powder - no taste & not grainy like I thought it would be. Great to mix in with fruit juice & a banana if you're trying to replicate the Naked protein juices. My go-to from now on.
customer_reviews.author: jc

customer_reviews.title: Good product at a great price.
customer_reviews.text: Okay price for the product. Use it as a mix in for my iced coffee every morning to increase protein intake. However, it's a little rough on the digestion (I guess that's a side effect of soy). going to try whey isolate to see if that makes a difference.
customer_reviews.author: Slade G.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I liked this product because it didn't clump and didn't bad taste at all. In fact, I love the natural flavor. I mix in almond milk to make a great almondy protein shake after my workout.
customer_reviews.author: Zach

customer_reviews.title: Tastes like dung!
customer_reviews.text: My son says it tastes like crap! I told him to add a banana and he says it is so over powering and will probably throw it out! That sucks! I wanted to rate it with no stars but it won’t post unless I give it a one! Please send him a credit!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worse  Protein Brand
customer_reviews.text: I normally take soy protein to replace whey protein.. However, this particular soy protein is too heavy on my sistem. Also, there is no measurement scoop. Update: I couldn't continue using this product. What a waste of resources.
customer_reviews.author: elcoky

customer_reviews.title: I like the product.
customer_reviews.text: I use the protein powder as a supplement to my diet because of no cholesterol. Also, there are no additional ingredients such as flavor, dyes, sweeteners, or other vitamins or minerals, just pure plant protein.
customer_reviews.author: Frank A Granger

customer_reviews.title: This is my first time trying a soy protein powder ...
customer_reviews.text: This is my first time trying a soy protein powder as I have always used traditional whey protein my whole life. I have no trouble mixing this product with my post-workout shake and almond milk. I tend to add a scoop of my whey protein to add some flavoring with this however. The only reason I won't give this 5 stars is because the sealing bag refuses to seal and it comes without a scooper. Other than that the product seems to do the job.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No sugar added
customer_reviews.text: i like this soy protein product because it doesn’t come with sweetener such as sugar, just pure protein. It is tasteless. I mix with full cream milk and the taste is better than pure protein powder alone. I consume this after exercise and it really helps to build and repair muscle tissue. It is better to consume it soon after exercise, than to consume it few hours after exercise.
customer_reviews.author: Toh Hiap Soon Amos

customer_reviews.title: mixes easily
customer_reviews.text: third package I have purchased. I mix it with a plant protein drink and don't really even taste it. It mixes in good no lumps.
customer_reviews.author: Denise Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Recommend to others!
customer_reviews.text: It tastes pretty good and it a great product in general. I would recommend this soy protein to others! The only minor down-side is this product has difficulty dissolving in water.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: As advertised
customer_reviews.text: The taste is pretty bad and it foams up a lot. I don’t know what I was expecting. It is “unflavored” and it tastes kind of like soylent, but without any sweetness. Slightly bitter
customer_reviews.author: Gilbert O'Neil

customer_reviews.title: Good Soy
customer_reviews.text: I'm using 20g on my breakfast as a supplement along my morning coffee. Mixes quite well and doesn't taste/feel like beach sand unlike other Soy protein powders out there. Will buy again after it runs out.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Arriaga

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, good price, great buy
customer_reviews.text: Great for the price. Cant really taste it once its mixed into a smoothie or even just blended into milk and doesn't create an undesirable consistency like some protein powders that clump up in liquid. Highly recommend for anyone that is allergic to dairy and is looking for a decent protein supplement!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: High protein content, terrible taste
customer_reviews.text: Great protein content and ingredients are simple. However you better have some mining good to mix it with because it tastes awful with water.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Jones

customer_reviews.title: Best Bulk Value
customer_reviews.text: Mixes easily & comes completely. Really taste best with Orange Splash.
customer_reviews.author: Luke Easter

customer_reviews.title: Great protein isolate! Too bad it isn’t organic..
customer_reviews.text: This product is awesome! Thanks! Con: the Mylar bag is terrible; it doesn’t reseal, which allows moisture in or the powder escapes into the room onto your counter and/or clothing. Tip: seal it in another double ziplock style bag to keep moisture out.
customer_reviews.author: Dean D.

customer_reviews.title: Plant Protein
customer_reviews.text: Lacks the flavor of the Abbott/EAS brand, vanilla flavor, but otherwise good. My doc wanted me to have more protein but not unless it was from plants. I do wish the company (Bulksuppliments) could add vanilla flavoring. Or tell me how to flavor it myself.
customer_reviews.author: alden  p lewis

customer_reviews.title: Smooth mixing soy proten
customer_reviews.text: My favorite soy protein was discontinued. Had tried several, this was best. Mixes smoothly, not grainy. Vanilla Not too sweet. Good value. Received promptly
customer_reviews.author: pat o

customer_reviews.title: This soy protein isolate mixes well with whatever liquid you're ...
customer_reviews.text: This soy protein isolate mixes well with whatever liquid you're mixing it with. I've added it to cereal, and it tastes OK. It's unflavored and without any sugar/sweetners - but it adds a bit of earthiness to whatever you're adding it to.
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking to replace a pricier option on Amazon, and this fit the bill. It tastes great in smoothies. It doesn't come with a scoop and it's tricky to close the Zip-Loc-like closure...the only very minor downsides.
customer_reviews.author: Keith312

customer_reviews.title: Good nutrition but bad mouth feel
customer_reviews.text: This product has everything I want in the realm of nutrition. A lot of protein, low calories, and no cholesterol. But when I mix it up, the final product always comes out grainy with a terrible mouth feel.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Its good cheap protien. Bulk Supplements is a great company. Period !
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I followed the easy to follow instructions, drinking a mix of this and almond milk after my workouts. Gotta say, I’m seeing a difference! Great alternative to whey protein. Yes, it’s chunky, yes, it’s chalky, yes, it isn’t the easiest to mix up. I’d expect nothing less from protein powder. Great product, will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin Reiland

customer_reviews.title: Bad taste
customer_reviews.text: Smells like cat pee, tastes like some industrial residue and foams like soap
customer_reviews.author: Lucas T

customer_reviews.title: All thumbs up!
customer_reviews.text: Thumbs up all the way around. Great products delivered on or before time. Couldn’t be happier.
customer_reviews.author: Muleskinner

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Value
customer_reviews.text: The quality is excellent and the price is fair. I have ordered this product multiple times and have no reason to switch to anything else. I use it every day and I'm very happy with the value.
customer_reviews.author: agperry14

customer_reviews.title: Best bang for your buck
customer_reviews.text: Best bang for your buck as far as serving size, amount of protein per, and price. It doesn't taste like anything so as long as you're adding fruit with it you'll be good to go. Adds a level of thickness to your smoothie, highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: Keto versatility...GREAT product, great price!
customer_reviews.text: FANTASTIC! Transaction and item were perfect! My Keto lifestyle appreciates the versatility of this product!
customer_reviews.author: Lonnie C. Appleby

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: This was a great price with fast delivery i will definitely buy this product again. A little bit goes a long way
customer_reviews.author: Norma R.

customer_reviews.title: This product has been great so far
customer_reviews.text: This product has been great so far! It has a creamy consistency and blends well into smoothies without too much of a protein powder flavor. I am really enjoying this protein powder and would highly recommend it to anyone who wants a great product without any unnecessary frills. Bulk supplements seems like a great company, and I definitely plan to continue purchasing from them in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Kenna Cromwell

customer_reviews.title: As advertised
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. I mix this with a flavored whey and naked casein powder. It’s not flavored so you can literally add it to anything.
customer_reviews.author: A. White

customer_reviews.title: which I like. Very thick when mixed with moderate amounts of ...
customer_reviews.text: Has no sugar or flavoring, which I like. Very thick when mixed with moderate amounts of liquid - the recommended serving produces a shake-like consistency, which I enjoy.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Gruber

customer_reviews.title: Great for smoothies
customer_reviews.text: I used this to make smoothies. The texture of the smoothie was smooth and thick and the flavor of the items in the smoothie wasn’t affected by the protein powder. Really good and filling
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Guyton

customer_reviews.title: No taste. Works great
customer_reviews.text: Very good. I have had no gastrointestinal problems with this powder. And i have lactose intolerance and ibs. Put this in my morning protein shake
customer_reviews.author: s

customer_reviews.title: Works well for me
customer_reviews.text: I am a female runner and this stuff works great for me. I add it to my shake and it helps a lot. The price is great too.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Margrave

customer_reviews.title: Product expired
customer_reviews.text: Best used by date was 11 months prior to the date received.
customer_reviews.author: DWilliams

customer_reviews.title: Strong Taste
customer_reviews.text: Strong taste but mix it with a fruit and problem solved
customer_reviews.author: Esteban

customer_reviews.title: Always good
customer_reviews.text: I usually take this the first thing in the morning with oj or simply with water. Occasionally put a scoop of this in yorgut to boost protein. Shipping is fast, always you can count on them!
customer_reviews.author: shkz

customer_reviews.title: Best Soy
customer_reviews.text: Our favorite of all the soy products sold on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: CMC

customer_reviews.title: Unable to close the bag
customer_reviews.text: Now that I have opened it, the bag won't seal back up so it is all going bad. A waste of money because of the packaging.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's good for protein
customer_reviews.text: Just like it says it's pure protein so there's not much taste which is fine. Also since it's just protein i don't have to use as much.
customer_reviews.author: Griffin Payer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality at a great price
customer_reviews.text: This affordable unflavored soy protein Isolate is great. Better priced and better quality than competitors. Only issue is the seal on the packaging is hard to close up after use so having a separate air tight container to keep the powder fresh is a good idea.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Scarangello

customer_reviews.title: Probably one of the higher vegan proteins out there
customer_reviews.text: Works good, helps get a little extra protein. I mixed it with almond milk, makes it really chalky and not the best taste but it's not horrible either and im not in it for the taste.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Best Plant protein on the market!
customer_reviews.text: Love this to add protein to my plant based diet! I was struggling to get even close to my goal macros before I received this product. My smoothies are delicious. Will order the 20 kg soon! Best plant protein powder best price too.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Kaczynski

customer_reviews.title: Soy protein
customer_reviews.text: I juice some of my garden products and add the ,soy for protein . Can't tast it works very well
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Powder mixes well and tastes good to me
customer_reviews.text: First experience with soy protein. The soft packaging takes a little getting used to, but not a problem. Powder mixes well and tastes good to me. I will definitely be buying more. Too early to tell how effective the protein is, but I am very confident.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis O'Brien

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It worked just fine for me. A very good buy for the money. Will buy it again as needed.
customer_reviews.author: J.W.

customer_reviews.title: The quality of the product is very good. The pricing is very competitive
customer_reviews.text: The quality of the product is very good. The pricing is very competitive. I found the supplier easy to work with. If they carry a product I need I will certainly strongly consider it.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce Jones

customer_reviews.title: Formed moulds when put in water
customer_reviews.text: Not a great taste. It formed moulds when mixed with water.
customer_reviews.author: dinesh

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: Used this in different smoothies for my keto diet, great price for the amount of product you get!
customer_reviews.author: Mariah

customer_reviews.title: This powder blends easily with other drinks like smoothies and with unsweetened almond ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm lactose intolerant, so I needed a protein powder that wouldn't irritate my stomach. This powder blends easily with other drinks like smoothies and with unsweetened almond milk. The taste isn't the best when drinking it alone, but it gets the job done!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as expected. Glad to have found it!
customer_reviews.text: I've been looking for a simple, soy-based protein powder since my favorite retailer pulled theirs from the shelves. As a pure vegetarian, I don't like whey or casein. The bitterness and oily consistency of hemp is terrible. I don't digest pea protein well. This leaves me with soy. I put it in my post-workout smoothies and it doesn't overpower the flavors of the other ingredients. It mixes well - very creamy and nice. I haven't tried it "straight-up" and likely will never do so. It'd be nice if Bulksupplements sold cacao but I don't see it.
customer_reviews.author: Lattemonster

customer_reviews.title: It is exactly what they say it is
customer_reviews.text: It was exactly what I thought it was going to be
customer_reviews.author: Laurie

customer_reviews.title: ... would be more of a problem but it's actually pretty tasy with almond milk cocoa and a bit of ...
customer_reviews.text: I thought the taste would be more of a problem but it's actually pretty tasy with almond milk cocoa and a bit of sugar. Loved the product and Im excited to try the pea protein :) I just wish they also had a vevgan gainer, that would be sweet
customer_reviews.author: alj yavuzaygen

customer_reviews.title: Very Good Protein Powder
customer_reviews.text: I have used this protein powder for a long time now and it is awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas W. Kasbohm

customer_reviews.title: So many reasons to buy.
customer_reviews.text: Very good protein powder! easy to mix, tasteless, cheap (price NOT quality), and excellent serving to protein per serving ratio. 33 servings is easily a months serving for me. Would recommend 5/5
customer_reviews.author: Omar

customer_reviews.title: Delicious
customer_reviews.text: Delicious. Not a big taste but neutral enough and it's a good way to get my vegan protein shake in.
customer_reviews.author: SassySaraBeth

customer_reviews.title: add to anything, vegetarians need it for amino acids
customer_reviews.text: no smell to it, add to eggs, soups etc. vegetarians need it-really
customer_reviews.author: Satisfied CustomerTop Contributor: Guitars

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't mix
customer_reviews.text: The flavor is good, but it doesn't mix well. I've tried everything and it just won't mix, leaves everything clumpy
customer_reviews.author: Dale

customer_reviews.title: High in protein
customer_reviews.text: It has a odd taste, but thats what i expected for soy pp. I use it in smothies and it is not grainy
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer
